EmailTemplate.description: Survey sent to companies that inquire to us about integrations.
EmailTemplate.name: Vendor Request Form
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Prospective Partner,
Thank you for your interest in VinSolutions! Please click on the link below and fill out our vendor information form. Upon submit our team will review your request and reach out to you with any questions.
Click here to fill out the form.
